backend/main.mo: Main actor defining user profiles with Pro subscription tracking, game management (CRUD operations), access control integration, blob storage mixin, and Stripe payment integration with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles to new schema by adding hasProSubscription field (defaulting to false) while preserving existing games and profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: Stripe payment integration for $20 Pro tier, two new 3D games with Three.js, gold color theme update, and gold-toned background texture generation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including gold-themed styling, Pro upgrade routes, payment flows, chat with context-aware AI responses, ultra-photorealistic media generation with advanced Canvas API rendering, and various AI-powered tools.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based color system defining light and dark mode variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags, PWA manifest link, JSON-LD structured data, and Apple-specific meta tags for iOS Safari compatibility.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme OKLCH color system, sticky header with navigation tabs, card-based layout, and fade-in animations for tab content switching.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata with standalone display mode, black theme color, and maskable icons at 192x192 and 512x512 resolutions.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all paths on the site.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap defining 9 URLs for the application hosted on ICP, including home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, and games pages with priorities and update frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application entry point that sets up React Query, TanStack Router with routes for all features (chat, math, media, translator, music, art, code, games), theme provider, and layout structure with header and outlet.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser, AI art idea generator chat, and artwork sharing functionality with URL generation and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/components/ChatPage.tsx: Chat page layout component that manages sidebar visibility, session selection, and displays either ChatView for active sessions or a welcome screen with close button navigation.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component displaying chat session list with timestamps, new chat button, loading states, and session selection handling with responsive design.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays message history with user/assistant avatars, handles message sending with simulated typing delays, and generates contextual AI responses.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches and displays errors with a styled error card, showing error details and providing reset/reload options.
frontend/src/components/GameBrowser.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of games with tabs for all/user/AI-created games. Supports game deletion for owners and launches GamePlayer when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Renders an individual game card with thumbnail, title, description, creator badge (AI/User), and a play button. Includes hover effects and click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GameModeModal.ts: Modal dialog presenting three options: play built-in games, browse community games, or create a new game. Routes user to appropriate view based on selection.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: Embeds and plays games in an iframe with fullscreen support, score tracking via postMessage, and high score persistence. Handles both predefined template games and user-created games.
frontend/src/components/GameStudio.tsx: Form-based game creation interface where authenticated users can input title, description, and HTML/CSS/JS code to create and save new games to the backend.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: Main games section container managing view state (menu/browse/create/playing) with navigation between predefined games selector, game browser, game studio, and game player.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app branding, theme toggle, authentication status, user profile display with Pro badge, and navigation buttons (home, sign out, upgrade to Pro).
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying a grid of navigation cards for different AI tools (Math Solver, Chat, Translator, Code, Music, Art, Media, Games) with admin-only PaymentSetup component.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver with difficulty levels (K-2 through 11-12), teacher mode for concept explanations, homework helper mode with chat history, and client-side expression evaluation with step-by-step solutions.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Media search interface with tabs for images and videos, featuring auto-search with debouncing, image download functionality, video preview dialog, and real-time web search integration.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation tool with AI prompt-based generation and beat pattern sequencer for kick/snare/hihat, including tempo control, playback, sharing functionality, and Web Audio API integration.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Payment cancellation page displaying error state with explanation of what happened and action buttons to return home or retry the Pro upgrade purchase.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSetup.tsx: Admin component for configuring Stripe payment integration with secret key input, allowed countries configuration, and status display showing whether Stripe is configured.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Success page displayed after completing a Pro subscription payment, listing all unlocked features and providing navigation buttons to home or chat.
frontend/src/components/PredefinedGameSe: Dialog component displaying a grid of predefined games (Flappy Bird, Snake, Pong, etc.) with Pro-only games locked behind subscription, allowing users to select and launch games.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog for first-time users to enter their name and create their user profile, blocking interaction until completed.
frontend/src/components/ProUpgrade.tsx: Marketing page for Pro subscription ($20 USD) that lists all premium features and initiates Stripe checkout session when user clicks upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: Chat-style interface for generating code snippets from natural language descriptions, with copy-to-clipboard functionality and message history display.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: React component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, fetching from backend hooks and showing loading/error states with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation UI component with language selection dropdowns, text input, and translation history display using the useTranslation hook for 12 supported languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) with randomized creative descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: React Query mutation hook for sharing artwork by generating a local artwork ID; backend sharing is disabled and only client-side URL generation/copying is supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API by creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics, converting AudioBuffer to WAV blob format.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Canvas drawing hook managing mouse/touch drawing state, brush properties (color, size, erasing), coordinate transformations, and canvas clearing functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: Manages chat sessions with localStorage persistence, including message history and AI response generation with context-aware replies for greetings, math, science, and other educational topics.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: Provides a mutation hook to create Stripe checkout sessions via the backend actor, handling success/cancel URLs and JSON parsing of the session response.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: Provides query hooks for fetching game catalogue data, individual game metadata, categories, and games by category from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides CRUD operations for games including fetching all games, single game by ID, creating new games, and deleting games via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Manages game high scores using localStorage with query and mutation hooks for retrieving and updating scores per game ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageSearch.ts: Implements free image search using Unsplash Source API without requiring API keys, fetching 12 varied images per search query with different seeds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with idle handling options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Analyzes text prompts to extract visual attributes (colors, shapes, subjects, actions, styles) and manages state for generated images and videos with detailed prompt parsing logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: Provides mutation hook for sharing music with local ID generation and URL copying functionality, though backend music sharing support has been removed.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Custom React hook for generating mock code scripts based on user requests, supporting React, Python, JavaScript, API, and calculator templates with simulated AI processing delays.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content that intentionally throw errors since backend no longer supports these features.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook providing mock translation functionality with support for common phrases in 12 languages including greetings and thanks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles via the actor backend, with toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSearch.ts: Custom hook for searching videos from a curated database of free sample videos organized by categories (nature, animals, technology, sports, etc.) with keyword matching.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom gold-themed color variables for light and dark modes, including sidebar styling and background image setup.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
Complete HTML/CSS/JavaScript template for a playable Breakout game with paddle, ball, bricks, scoring, lives, and level progression.
frontend/src/templates/flappyBirdTemplat: Exports a complete HTML template for a Flappy Bird game with bird sprite, pipe obstacles, gravity physics, score tracking, and game over/restart functionality.
Exports an HTML template for a Fortnite-inspired shooter game featuring enemies, teammates, health/level systems, weapon shop with upgrades, and shooting mechanics.
frontend/src/templates/minecraftTemplate: Exports an HTML template for a Minecraft-style block mining game with a grid-based world, different block types (grass, dirt, stone, diamond), player movement, and resource collection.
frontend/src/templates/pongTemplate.ts: Exports an HTML template for a classic Pong game with player paddle controls, AI opponent, ball physics, score tracking to 10 points, and win/restart functionality.
frontend/src/templates/robloxTemplate.ts: Exports an HTML template for a Roblox-style platformer with player character, multiple platforms, coin collection, jumping mechanics, and gravity physics.
frontend/src/templates/snakeTemplate.ts: Exports a complete HTML template string for a classic Snake game with canvas rendering, keyboard/touch controls, scoring system, and game over screen with restart functionality.
frontend/src/utils/errorLogger.ts: Implements a singleton ErrorLogger class that captures, stores, and outputs log entries with severity levels (info, warning, error, critical) to console and maintains a rolling buffer of the last 100 logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear sensitive parameters from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a comprehensive design system with OKLCH color variables, custom theme extensions for sidebar/chart colors, typography/container plugins, and animation keyframes for accordion and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking the Nexora AI app's architecture, existing features (games, AI tools), and pending Pro tier upgrade requirements including Stripe integration, 3D games, AI art generation, voice recording, and gold theme implementation.
